grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 患部【カンブ】affected part, diseased part, wound
疾患【シッカン】disease, ailment, illness
kun reading compounds: 患う【わずらう】to be ill, to suffer from, to worry about, to be concerned about, to have trouble doing ..., to be unable to ..., to fail to ...
